mapper.insert: INSERT INTO activity(act_id, act_pubber_id, act_title, image_path, act_content) VALUES(#{actId}, #{actPubberId}, #{actTitle} ,#{imagePath}, #{actContent})

INSERT INTO message(message_id, act_id, source_id, target_id, reply_id, is_read, message_type, comment_act_id) VALUES(#{messageId}, #{actId}, #{sourceId}, #{targetId}, #{replyId}, #{isRead}, #{messageType}, #{commentActId})
mapper.select: SELECT act_id, act_pubber_id, act_title, image_path, act_content FROM activity WHERE act_id = #{value}

SELECT a.account_id, a.role_id, a.account_name, a.account_address, a.account_class_id, a.account_password, a.account_phone, a.account_sex, a.t_subject, a.par_id, act.act_id, act.act_pubber_id, act.act_title, act.image_path, act.act_content FROM account a INNER JOIN activity act ON a.account_id = act.act_pubber_id
